about.summary: Tools for building JupyterLite sites (with libarchive)
Tools for building JupyterLite sites (with jupyterlab)
Tools for building JupyterLite sites (with contents)
Tools for building JupyterLite sites (with translation)
Tools for building JupyterLite sites (with serve)
Tools for building JupyterLite sites (with check)
Tools for building JupyterLite sites (with all)
Tools for building JupyterLite sites (with libarchive)
Tools for building JupyterLite sites (with jupyterlab)
Tools for building JupyterLite sites (with contents)
Tools for building JupyterLite sites (with translation)
Tools for building JupyterLite sites (with serve)
Tools for building JupyterLite sites (with check)
Tools for building JupyterLite sites (with all)

name: jupyterlite-core
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.5.0" %}

# handle undefined PYTHON in noarch: generic outputs
{% set PYTHON = PYTHON | default("$PYTHON") %}

{% if 1 %}
  # this `if` keeps the bot from making duplicates
  {% set js_version = version.replace("a", "-alpha.").replace("b", "-beta.").replace("rc", "-rc.") %}
  {% set jupyterlab_version = ">=4.3.4,<4.4" %}
  {% set notebook_version = ">=7.3.2,<7.4" %}
{% endif %}

package:
  name: jupyterlite-core
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/j/jupyterlite-core/jupyterlite_core-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: b9fb0704a77f46ad205577fa1aac3bcbb2caa33db1d07850af542390707f19e3

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script:
    - {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation --disable-pip-version-check
    - {{ PYTHON }} {{ RECIPE_DIR }}/extract-third-party-licenses.py
  entry_points:
    - jupyter-lite = jupyterlite_core.app:main

requirements:
  host:
    - hatchling >=1.6.3,<2
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}
  run:
    - doit >=0.34,<1
    - importlib-metadata >=3.6
    - jupyter_core >=4.7
    - python >={{ python_min }}

test:
  imports:
    - jupyterlite_core
  commands:
    - pip check
    - jupyter-lite --help
  requires:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}

outputs:
  - name: jupyterlite-core

  - name: jupyterlite-core-with-libarchive
    build:
      noarch: generic
    requirements:
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("jupyterlite-core", max_pin="x.x.x") }}
        - python-libarchive-c >=4.0
    test:
      imports:
        - jupyterlite_core
      commands:
        - pip check
        - jupyter lite --help
      requires:
        - pip
        - python {{ python_min }}
    about:
      home: https://github.com/jupyterlite/jupyterlite
      summary: Tools for building JupyterLite sites (with libarchive)
      doc_url: https://jupyterlite.readthedocs.io
      license: BSD-3-Clause
      license_file:
        - LICENSE

  - name: jupyterlite-core-with-lab
    build:
      noarch: generic
    requirements:
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("jupyterlite-core", max_pin="x.x.x") }}
        - jupyterlab {{ jupyterlab_version }}
        - notebook {{ notebook_version }}
    test:
      imports:
        - jupyterlite_core
      commands:
        - pip check
        - jupyter lite --help
      requires:
        - pip
        - python {{ python_min }}
    about:
      home: https://github.com/jupyterlite/jupyterlite
      summary: Tools for building JupyterLite sites (with jupyterlab)
      doc_url: https://jupyterlite.readthedocs.io
      license: BSD-3-Clause
      license_file:
        - LICENSE

  - name: jupyterlite-core-with-contents
    build:
      noarch: generic
    requirements:
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("jupyterlite-core", max_pin="x.x.x") }}
        - jupyter_server
    test:
      imports:
        - jupyterlite_core
      commands:
        - pip check
        - jupyter lite --help
      requires:
        - pip
        - python {{ python_min }}
    about:
      home: https://github.com/jupyterlite/jupyterlite
      summary: Tools for building JupyterLite sites (with contents)
      doc_url: https://jupyterlite.readthedocs.io
      license: BSD-3-Clause
      license_file:
        - LICENSE

  - name: jupyterlite-core-with-translation
    build:
      noarch: generic
    requirements:
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("jupyterlite-core", max_pin="x.x.x") }}
        - jupyterlab_server >=2.8.1,<3
    test:
      imports:
        - jupyterlite_core
      commands:
        - pip check
        - jupyter lite --help
      requires:
        - pip
        - python {{ python_min }}
    about:
      home: https://github.com/jupyterlite/jupyterlite
      summary: Tools for building JupyterLite sites (with translation)
      doc_url: https://jupyterlite.readthedocs.io
      license: BSD-3-Clause
      license_file:
        - LICENSE

  - name: jupyterlite-core-with-serve
    build:
      noarch: generic
    requirements:
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("jupyterlite-core", max_pin="x.x.x") }}
        - tornado >=6.1
    test:
      imports:
        - jupyterlite_core
      commands:
        - pip check
        - jupyter lite --help
      requires:
        - pip
        - python {{ python_min }}
    about:
      home: https://github.com/jupyterlite/jupyterlite
      summary: Tools for building JupyterLite sites (with serve)
      doc_url: https://jupyterlite.readthedocs.io
      license: BSD-3-Clause
      license_file:
        - LICENSE

  - name: jupyterlite-core-with-check
    build:
      noarch: generic
    requirements:
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("jupyterlite-core", max_pin="x.x.x") }}
        - jsonschema-with-format-nongpl >=3
    test:
      imports:
        - jupyterlite_core
      commands:
        - pip check
        - jupyter lite --help
      requires:
        - pip
        - python {{ python_min }}
    about:
      home: https://github.com/jupyterlite/jupyterlite
      summary: Tools for building JupyterLite sites (with check)
      doc_url: https://jupyterlite.readthedocs.io
      license: BSD-3-Clause
      license_file:
        - LICENSE

  - name: jupyterlite-core-with-all
    build:
      noarch: generic
    requirements:
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("jupyterlite-core-with-check", max_pin="x.x.x") }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage("jupyterlite-core-with-contents", max_pin="x.x.x") }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage("jupyterlite-core-with-lab", max_pin="x.x.x") }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage("jupyterlite-core-with-libarchive", max_pin="x.x.x") }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage("jupyterlite-core-with-serve", max_pin="x.x.x") }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage("jupyterlite-core-with-translation", max_pin="x.x.x") }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage("jupyterlite-core", max_pin="x.x.x") }}
    test:
      imports:
        - jupyterlite_core
      commands:
        - pip check
        - jupyter lite --help
        - pytest -vv --pyargs jupyterlite_core --script-launch-mode=subprocess --cov=jupyterlite_core --cov-report=term-missing:skip-covered --no-cov-on-fail --cov-fail-under=93
      requires:
        - diffoscope  # [linux]
        - pip
        - pytest-console-scripts >=1.4.0
        - pytest-cov
        - python {{ python_min }}
    about:
      home: https://github.com/jupyterlite/jupyterlite
      summary: Tools for building JupyterLite sites (with all)
      doc_url: https://jupyterlite.readthedocs.io
      license: BSD-3-Clause
      license_file:
        - LICENSE

about:
  home: https://github.com/jupyterlite/jupyterlite
  summary: Tools for building JupyterLite sites
  doc_url: https://jupyterlite.readthedocs.io
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_file:
    - LICENSE
    - third-party-licenses.json

extra:
  feedstock-name: jupyterlite-core
  recipe-maintainers:
    - bollwyvl
    - jtpio
    - martinRenou
